Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ
Entry.EnglishText: Selena

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車屋
Entry.EnglishText: Carriage Coach

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: ここがペトナジャンカ…… ずいぶん静かな街だな。
Entry.EnglishText: So this is Petnadjanka... It's a rather quiet city.

Entry.JapaneseText: 以前に来た時は、もっと にぎやかな街だったような……
Entry.EnglishText: Last time I was here, it seemed much more lively.

Entry.JapaneseText: 嫌な予感がする……
Entry.EnglishText: I have a bad feeling about this...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり……<Blue>王の盾<White>？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think it's because of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: おそらくな……気をつけて進もう。
Entry.EnglishText: Most likely... Stay on your guard.

Entry.JapaneseText: あれ、ここは……？ ペトナジャンカ……だよな？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh...? I'm in Petnadjanka?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>？ <Hilda>？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>? <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、おれは…… どうしちまったんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: How did I... What the heck is going on...?

Entry.JapaneseText: おーい、みんなー！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, where is everyone!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>、何やってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, just what are you doing?

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴……？ なんでこんなところに……？
Entry.EnglishText: Sis...? What are you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでって…… おかしな事を言うのね？ 巡回の時間だから呼びに 来たんじゃないの。
Entry.EnglishText: What am I doing here? That's a silly question. It's time for the patrol, so I came to get you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 巡回？
Entry.EnglishText: Patrol?

Entry.JapaneseText: ま、待ってくれよ、姉貴。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, wait up, Sis...

Entry.JapaneseText: 誰もいないのに、すすり泣く声が 聞こえるなんて…… そんなこと、私には信じられません。
Entry.EnglishText: Hearing someone cry despite no one being there... I can't believe such a thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、あんなに怖がっているのが ウソだとは思えない……
Entry.EnglishText: But with how scared he was, I don't think he was lying.

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく工場に行って、 みんなに話を聞いてみようぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, let's go to the factory and ask the other workers about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo... Coo...

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short on money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Travel by Carriage? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車で<unk18:48D00428B8048880>に移動します。 料金<nmb:12C>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>To travel to <unk18:48D00428B8048880> by Carriage, it'll be <nmb:12C> Gald. Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>……!! 工場では…… 大変だったみたいだね……
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>...!! Something seems to have happened at the factory...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さんが セレーナさんを……？
Entry.EnglishText: You're going to save Selena...?

Entry.JapaneseText: と、とにかく…… お気をつけて……
Entry.EnglishText: A-Anyways... Please, take care...

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナさんが、 助かったみたいでよかったわね、 <Tytree>。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like Selena has finally been saved. Isn't that nice, <Tytree>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅はまだ続けるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you going to continue with your journey?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの変な力を使う連中から、 セレーナさんを取り戻すなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: You managed to save Selena from those guys with the strange powers...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さんもスゴイんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: You're all amazing...

Entry.JapaneseText: あら、<Tytree> 何してるの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>, what are you doing?

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場巡回の時間でしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you supposed to be patrolling the factory?

Entry.JapaneseText: あら、またどこかへ行くの？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, are you heading somewhere again?

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつけて いってらっしゃいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You be careful and take care of yourself!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>はにぎやかな子だから、 一緒にいても飽きないでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>'s a really lively boy, I'm sure being with him never gets boring.

Entry.JapaneseText: あら、あなた…… 前に<Tytree>と 一緒だった子たちね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh... You were the ones who were travelling with <Tytree> before, weren't you?

Entry.JapaneseText: また一緒にお出かけ？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you heading off somewhere with him again?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨソの街から ガジュマがたくさん逃げてきて、 大変なんだから。
Entry.EnglishText: Things are getting worse now that Gajuma are running away from other towns and coming here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く街に戻ってきて、 手伝ってよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry and come back home, your help is needed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街を追い出されたとかで、 ガジュマたちがこの街にやって来て、 みんな大変です。
Entry.EnglishText: Things have been getting worse since those Gajuma who were kicked out of other towns started living here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人手不足だった工場は 嬉しい悲鳴を 上げてるみたいですけどね。
Entry.EnglishText: Although, it seems like they're happy with the influx of workers over at the factory,

Entry.JapaneseText: 相変わらずこの街は大変よ。 ガジュマがたくさん 工場で働くようになってから 私すごく不安なのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Things aren't so great here right now. Ever since all these Gajuma started working at the factory, I've been anxious.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>がいるのといないのでは 街の雰囲気も全然違うのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: This town just isn't the same when <Tytree> isn't around.

Entry.JapaneseText: ご病気で伏されてるはずの女王陛下が ベルサスで演説されたと聞きました。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that Her Majesty the Queen gave a speech in Belsas, despite supposedly being ill.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、どうなってるんでしょう？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's going on with her...

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ますますガジュマが 頭に乗っちゃって……
Entry.EnglishText: Recently, more and more Gajuma have started to push their luck...

Entry.JapaneseText: それというのも、 ジルバ様が妙な演説をするからだわ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Ever since I heard Zilva give that strange speech of hers, that is.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、女王陛下は 何をされているのかしら。
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if the Queen is going to do anything about it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王陛下が 立派な演説をされたという事は 人伝に聞きました。
Entry.EnglishText: I've heard people talk about how the Queen gave a splendid speech.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、国の要職にあるジルバ様が 種族主義を助長するような事を おっしゃるなんて。
Entry.EnglishText: But to think that Lady Zilva, of all people, would promote racism.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうなってるんでしょうかね……
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what's going on...

Entry.JapaneseText: 小耳に挟んだんだけど、 今、ミナールでは毎日のように いさかいが起きてるんですって。
Entry.EnglishText: Word on the street is that there have been daily conflicts in Minal as of late.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナールに行くなら、 気をつけたほうがいいわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Make sure to watch yourselves if you're heading there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール……
Entry.EnglishText: Minal...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヨソから来た女の子が 工場で起こってたもめ事を 解決したらしいの。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that a girl from out of town resolved the dispute they had down at the factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ若い娘さんだったのに…… 関心だわ……
Entry.EnglishText: It caught my attention because she's still young...

Entry.JapaneseText: 工場で働く人々の不満が 大きくなってるみたい。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like dissatisfaction is growing amongst the factory workers.

Entry.JapaneseText: 特にガジュマの間では……
Entry.EnglishText: Especially among the Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何？ この揺れ……
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? The ground is shaking...

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間の争いも以前よりは 幾分かやわらいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: The tension between Huma and Gajuma has died down somewhat, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ少し ギクシャクしてるわね。
Entry.EnglishText: ...It still feels like there's a bit of tension between the two.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマもヒューマも 何かわだかまりを 残してるみたいです。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like there's still some ill will remaining between Huma and Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かきっかけさえあれば、 うまくやれそうな気も するんですけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I think we could work things out if given the opportunity.

Entry.JapaneseText: おかえりなさい、<Tytree>。 セレーナさんは元気にやってるから 心配しないで。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome back, <Tytree>. No need to worry about your sister, she's doing fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカは鉄の街。 ものも豊富で、 とても恵まれた街なの。
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka's a city of iron. It's very blessed to be such an affluent town.
Entry.Notes: 2nd line is jank Gator and Dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
